Package saleable

Class Saleable

  • java.lang.Object
    • saleable.Saleable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Selectable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HealingItem, PowerUp

    public abstract class Saleable
extends java.lang.Object
implements Selectable
    Provides a superclass to allow the product to be purchased in the game shop
    Author:
    fer25, par116

    • Method Detail

      • setHaggling

        public void setHaggling​(int haggling)
        Allows the purchasing Hero's haggling stat to be passed to the Saleable object before it is passed to an ItemSelector
        Parameters:
        haggling - the haggling stat of the purchasing Hero

      • getPrice

        public int getPrice​()
        Gets the sale price that the shop will remove from the teams purse
        Returns:
        The price

      • setRandom

        public abstract void setRandom​(java.util.Random r)
        Provides a psuedo random number generator to the object. This means that the same generator can be used for all object creations as if multiple new Random object are created in quick succession they all tend to produce the same first few numbers
        Parameters:
        r - The Random object to be used by the Saleable

      • getSaleDescriptor

        public abstract java.lang.String getSaleDescriptor​()
        Gets the descriptor that can be used in the store. Includes name and price
        Returns:
        The descriptor

      • sold

        public void sold​()
        Allows the Saleable object to know if it has been purchased
